main event: An observer sighted a circular object with rapidly changing colors in Harbor Springs, Michigan on January 3, 1958.
interesting points: The object changed colors in the order of green, red, orange, and white.,The sighting lasted for approximately 3 minutes.,The object was moving in a northeastern to southwestern course.,Three witnesses corroborated the observation.,The observer described the object as incoherent with an illumination similar to that of a flashbulb.
witness description: All witnesses were in direct agreement and had no prior experience with similar phenomena.
